titleStmt.title: The hypocritical nation described in a sermon preached at St. Maries in Cambridge, upon a day of publick fasting : with an epistle prefixed by Mr. Samuel Jacombe.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.
Jacombe, Samuel, d. 1659.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Simon Patrick by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
